value.stringValue: Maintains the range for all downstream rates, but shifts the bounds
Edits only the lower bound of the next rate

decisions.name: IsLastRateUpperBoundNull
decisions.label: Is Last Rate's Upper Bound Null?

validationRule.errorMessage: *Needs to be greater than {!ConsumptionRate_Last.LowerBound}
*Needs to be higher than {!ConsumptionRate.LowerBound}

fields.name: Message_UpperBoundExceeded
fields.fieldText: *Needs to be lower than {!ConsumptionRate_Next.UpperBound} when choosing Update Next behaviour

fields.name: Message_UpperBoundMustBeNull
fields.fieldText: *The upper bound for the last rate must be null

fields.name: Confirmation
fields.fieldText: The edit will impact other Consumption Rates. How do you want to handle it?
